SELECT rt.*, COUNT(CASE WHEN rt.recipe_key = rrt.recipe_key THEN 1 END) AS recipe_review_total_count FROM ( SELECT rt.recipe_key, rt.recipe_name, rt.recipe_desc, rt.recipe_lead_time, rt.recipe_level, rt.recipe_main_img_path, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(recipe_tag_desc) FROM recipe_tag_tb WHERE recipe_key = rt.recipe_key) recipe_tag_desc, rt.recipe_user_id FROM recipe_tb rt WHERE 1=1 AND rt.recipe_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{season_ingredient},'%') GROUP BY rt.recipe_key ) rt LEFT OUTER JOIN recipe_review_tb rrt ON rt.recipe_key = rrt.recipe_key GROUP BY rt.recipe_key
